categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Echo Support" was a female pilot that served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Following the destruction of Alderaan, she served as Echo Support as part of Echo Squadron and participated in a battle at Fostar Haven, where she flew a UT-60D U-wing starfighter/support craft.
"Echo Support" was a Rebel Alliance non-player character in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
